rules.natural: Either the job analyst is assigned to the platform lab or the job researcher is assigned to the platform lab.
Whenever protocol alpha is completed at facility main, protocol alpha is completed at facility secondary.
Given that protocol alpha is completed at facility secondary, protocol beta is completed at facility main.
If the job supervisor is assigned to platform management, then drug gamma is cleared at facility main.

If the job inspector is assigned to platform audit, then whenever it is not the case that cleared drug gamma at facility main implies operational platform lab, protocol gamma is suspended at facility main.

If the job auditor is assigned to platform audit, then the job reviewer is assigned to platform audit.

Whenever the job reviewer is assigned to platform audit, then if it is not the case that cleared drug gamma at facility main results in operational platform lab, protocol gamma is suspended at facility main.
Provided that the job researcher is assigned to the platform lab, the platform lab is operational.
If the job coordinator is assigned to platform operations, then either protocol alpha is completed at facility main or protocol alpha is not completed at facility secondary.

Provided that it is not true that approved facility secondary for drug alpha leads to tested drug alpha at facility secondary, drug alpha is not banned at facility main.
